field.note: This is the date used to determine if something is "new"
If set to 'Yes', this asset will not list the Asset thats been currently been accessed.

Only assets that are linked underneath the root node(s) with the appropriate link types will be listed. The default is to show links visible in the asset map, that is TYPE_1 and TYPE_2 links. This setting only applies when Direct Links Only is turned on.
The value provided in that field will be used to filter the assets returned. You will need to enable 'Link Value Filtering'.
This specifies if assets returned should have link value equal or different from the 'Link Value' field. You will need to enable 'Link Value Filtering'.

If set to 'Yes' and lookup direction is set to 'down the tree', only assets with the link value equal to the 'Link Value' field will be returned. If set to 'Yes' and the lookup direction is set as 'up the tree', only parents of children assets with the link value equal to the 'Link Value' field will be returned.
